person.persName: James Hayden Blair (Johnson County, farmer and soldier)

body.p: Johnson County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Noble Blair, Sr., and Abigail Blair. Married to Mary Horne Blair on January 24, 1850. Father of Edmund Blair, Margaret Blair, Nancy Blair, Lucy Ann Blair, Rhoda Blair, Amanda E. Blair, and John W. Blair. Resident in Johnson County in 1850. Farmer in Johnson County in 1860. Employed Harmon Adams as a farmer in Johnson County in 1860. Served in the 65th Regiment of Kentucky Militia (U.S.A.) as a corporal from May 21, 1864, to June 21, 1864.
